What is the outlook for Hereditary Spastic Paraplegia ?,The prognosis for individuals with HSP varies Some individuals are very disabled and others have only mild disability. The majority of individuals with uncomplicated HSP have a normal life expectancy.,NINDS,Hereditary Spastic Paraplegia
